meanings.definition: A fixed and regular payment, typically made on a monthly basis.
meanings.sent1: She received her stiped at the beginning of each month.
meanings.sent2: The company provides a stiped to all employees for their work.
meanings.sent3: The stiped was like a little gift from the company every month.
meanings.sent4: Her stiped was a lifeline that helped her budget effectively.
meanings.sent5: The stiped was her reliable source of income.

meanings.sent1: The stiped shirt had alternating blue and white stripes.
meanings.sent2: She wore a stiped scarf that matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The zebra looked quite fashionable in its stiped coat.
meanings.sent4: The stiped pattern on the wall added a unique touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The stiped design made the car stand out on the road.
